content.rendered:
Directed by Shefali Bhushan.

Written by Siddhant Behl. Shefali Bhushan. Shefali Bhushan. Shellee.

Cast Anurita Jha(Preeto). Sadhana Singh(Bibi Saroop). Sugandha Garg(Vibs). Sameer Sharma(Sid (as Samir Sharma)). Jaswant Daman(Dadi). Shivam Sharma(Nishant’s friend). Chandan Gill(Jeeta Jazbaati). Kartick Sitaraman(Nishant (Director)). Davinder Daman(Babaji (as Devinder Daman)). Divya Unny(TV Actress). Siddhant Behl(Mastana)

Language Hindi.

Producers Shashwat Arora. Shefali Bhushan. Anupama Bose. Karan Grover. Karan Grover. Manas Malhotra. Jagdeep Ruhil. Jagdeep Ruhil. Amrej Suryavanshi.

Production Dhun Productions.
